meanings.definition: The state of being tumultuous or chaotic.
meanings.sent1: The tumultuousnesses of the storm kept everyone indoors.
meanings.sent2: The city experienced a period of tumultuousnesses after the earthquake.
meanings.sent3: The picnic turned into a tumultuousnesses when the ants invaded the food.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a whirlwind of tumultuousnesses, making it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The tumultuousnesses of the market crash left many people in financial distress.

meanings.definition: A tumultuous or chaotic situation or event.
meanings.sent1: The political tumultuousnesses led to protests in the streets.
meanings.sent2: The concert turned into a tumultuousnesses when the band started playing.
meanings.sent3: The family reunion became a tumultuousnesses when the food fight broke out.
meanings.sent4: The tumultuousnesses of the battlefield made it hard to hear commands.
meanings.sent5: The tumultuousnesses of the traffic jam caused delays for hours.
